snippet: Monique Lamoureux-Kolls and her twin, Jocelyne Lamoureux, combined for five goals in the United States’ victory over Canada in an opening-round game in the Women’s World Hockey Championships.
abstract: United States women's hockey team defeats Canada, 9-2, in an opening-round game at the Women’s World Hockey Championships in Burlington, Vt.
lead_paragraph: Monique Lamoureux-Kolls and her twin, Jocelyne Lamoureux, combined for five goals in the United States’ victory over Canada in an opening-round game in the Women’s World Hockey Championships.
